post.body: Dude what happen to you tonight? LOl
Bro I hope you're working hard on your project. I know that you will do very well.
btw I hope you're working hard on your project. I know that you will do very well.
Dude I think you maybe right.
Doc what did you do to Anthony?
Bro, I agree this is not Anthony at all on the call.
Hey Kevin, it was nice to meet you at Tactic 7. If you need any help with your project, give me a call. Cheers, Teran
I am just recovering from the knock out info you delivered at Tactic 7. One of the best seminars I have ever attended.
Hi Jonathan, sorry we did not get to meet at Tactic 7 seminar. Excellent presentation, keep up the good work.
Hi Howard I can help you with your PPC campaigns. Check out my site http://xrl.us/beauyo
It’s good so far I will send it to you when finish reading.
Doc have you heard of Aesop Glim? I am reading his book the core of advertising.
Great video Perry, I went through the same thing.
Hi Del, you can use YouTube sponsored ads program to advertise your videos using PPC. https://ads.youtube.com/
Congratulations Tony keep-up the good work.
Michel I love your quotes keep them coming.
Hey Doc, did you get my email? I would love to get your opinion. Cheers, T
@Anthonycoyne I think so Doc. You should hear what he did yesterday at Toys R Us and outside the parking lot. Anthony is nuts!
Getting ready to go shopping, I can't stand the malls. I hope I don't go through the same situation you did. LOL
Interesting post on PPC. I believe broad match works. It depends on the right BM keywords, negs, structure and bidding strategy.
I don't think Arnold would be as successful. What do you think about Sergio Olivia?
Hi Ed, I herd that you are a guitar collector. What do you think about vintage Japanese guitars? I picked up a Greco & Orville.
Google maps are now showing YouTube videos when searching. Click on more options tab on Google maps. Video is becoming more important.
I am having a hard time with my ISP, getting disconnected within 45 minutes of being online. They suck.
60% of online video viewers are over the age of 35. http://xrl.us/o3iem
Cyber Monday numbers are out. No significant changes from last year. http://xrl.us/o3f7a
Great post Steve, I have been saying for a long time now, that human reviews of your site will play a bigger role in SEO/PPC. No more junk!
Google Adwords updates their alcohol policy http://xrl.us/o3d7e
Has anyone tried the following http://www.twellow.com/twellowhood/
Google releases Youtube Chanel on Google Analytics. Check it out. http://www.youtube.com/googleanalytics
I got Wes Montgomery playing in the background while working on super huge project. It’s going to be a good day.
The power of using video in your marketing. Over 100 Million views on Youtube for the Month of October http://xrl.us/o2vys
You can now advertise your adwords ads on mobile devices. This is great news for the B2B market. Try it out through edit campaign settings.
Checking out @MrTweet, my personal assistant for discovering the great followers and influencers in my network! http://mrtweet.net?c=11!
Is YouTube turning into a cash machine? http://xrl.us/72gwe
Crazy training - Serge Nubret training at 70 years young. http://xrl.us/6b9tr
Top 10 YouTube Videos of 2008. http://xrl.us/3q74x
Curently browsing article on PPC for small businesses http://xrl.us/3fp4k
Warner music videos are now being removed from YouTube. http://xrl.us/xno9u
New analytics program for Youtube. Now you can track unique views. http://xrl.us/xnieg
